name: 1v1 space battle
description:
this is a space battle game this will be updated maybe once an month . there are only 2 ships the controls are.

for bottom ship arrow keys to move and right ctrl to fire

for top ship wasd to move and f to fire

Game description

this game is a simple 2 player game "that took way to long to make" this game has some old pixel graphics.

you must have game maker to play

also the code can be changed you just need to know how to launch the game press the green play button.
